item.title: Computational Drug Design
item.description: Drug discovery is a slow and expensive process. We aim to accelerate drug discovery by developing advanced computational methods for drug design. Specifically, we focus on developing efficient and accurate methods for calculating protein-ligand binding free energy, which has important applications in drug discovery. Our approaches are based on rigorous synergy bewteen statistical mechanics and machine learning methods such as deep generative models.
